3: We're above Malacca Strait and will arrive in Wuming City soon!
As the pilot says this, a city landscape emerges from the distant horizon.
Wuming City, with a population of 33,600, is an important supply point along this route.
Because of that, its mayor smells the presence of Babylonia.
And that's how the city ends up on President Hassen's list of strongholds.
Are you really willing to help us?
In fact, because of a malfunction with our Central Purification Filter, the Corrupted were recently spotted wandering near the city walls.
You can take the route leading out of the city and clear them out.
